p: 250 mg of the following standard substances were weighed and placed in ground glass measuring flasks with volume of 25 ml: dodecane (±99%, Sigma-Aldrich Chemic GmbH, Germany) and nonadecane (±99%, Sigma-Aldrich Chemic GmbH, Germany), topping up to the mark with methanol or hexane, respectively, with HPLC purity.
